project_descr: This project will support ‘mainstreaming’ biodiversity considerations into the tourism sector, while strengthening the conservation of Cabo Verde’s important biodiversity by operationalising a critical new subset of Protected Areas

outputs.output_descr: ‘Mainstreaming’ biodiversity considerations into the tourism sector, while strengthening the conservation of Cabo Verde’s important biodiversity by operationalising a critical new subset of Protected Areas.

project_title: mainstreaming biodiversity conservation into the tourism
